description: This middle eastern inspired salmon is lightly spiced and delicious with a drizzle of yoghurt.
keywords: BBQ fish,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Cauliflower,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Ras El Hanout Salmon with Chickpeas & Cauliflower Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and chopped
400g cauliflower, chopped into florets, leaves included

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Brush the salmon fillets with half of the oil and coat with half of the ras el hanout. Tip the cauliflower, red onion, chickpeas into a large bowl, add the remaining oil, ras el hanout and lemon juice and toss to coat.

Spread the cauliflower, chickpeas and red onion on a baking tray and roast for 20 minutes. Remove the baking tray from the oven and add the salmon fillets. Roast for 15 minutes until the salmon is cooked through.
Mix the yoghurt, chopped coriander and lemon zest in a small bowl. Serve the salmon with roasted cauliflower, onions and chickpeas, a drizzle of yoghurt sauce and extra chopped coriander on top.
